author: harpocryptes
content:
Who knows if https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony-specs/blob/master/apiSpec/sequencerApi.yml is up to date?
It looks to me like some of that spec does not match what I get from seq.ceremony.ethereum.org

author: trent_vanepps
content: which parts are you noticing to be different?

author: harpocryptes
content:
For instance the receipt in ContributionReceipt:

description: "serialized JSON (to avoid unordered keys) with properties: id_token: { sub: string, nickname: string, provider: string, exp: u64 }, g2: [string] "

What I actually get: "identity" and "witness"

author: harpocryptes
content: There's also an "ecdsaSignature" in BatchContribution which is not specified (received an empty string as the value)
